name: Car Truck Hill Racing: Monster Mountain Climb
name_original: Car Truck Hill Racing: Monster Mountain Climb
description:
Fun with the Car Truck Hill Racing
- Easy to play.
- Right tap to speed up.
- Left tap to slow down.
reaches the top of the machines,starting with a basic cars to the top monster car. collect coins to buy new car. the game will brighten up you many boring hours.
Download now on App store.
